name: Flagship
description: Flagship enables creators to set up their own curated boutiques, without having to deal with inventory, customer service or sales tax. They partner with brands to power a large catalog that creators can curate from for their audience and earn a commission on every sale. When consumers discover and buy products from creator-owned stores, the platform automatically propagates the orders to partner brands and settles the payment between brands and creators. Flagship is setting a standard for a privacy-forward customer acquisition that is centered humans and entrepreneurs.
